tests.description: An array of test cases, each defining a specific event or HTML test to be performed.

oneOf.title: CheckEventTest
oneOf.description: A test case for verifying backend events triggered during task execution.

type.description: Specifies that this test is related to an event check.

event_type.description: The name of the event to check within the test case.

oneOf.title: CheckHTMLTest
oneOf.description: A test case for verifying HTML content by searching for specific keywords.

type.description: Specifies that this test is related to an HTML content check.

html_keywords.description: A list of keywords to search for in the HTML content.

items.description: A single keyword or phrase to verify task success.

oneOf.title: CheckPageViewTest
oneOf.description: A test case for verifying page view events when a user navigates to a URL.

type.description: Specifies that this test is related to a page view event check.

url.description: The URL that should trigger the page view event.
